title: Condensed Sans to accompany Bahnhof
content: I have a wordmark in all-caps [Bahnhof](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201085657/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/bahnhof/) regular, with some altered characters (for example, the hook on the L's have been removed) for increased uniformity. I am looking for a condensed sans to use for an auxiliary function - think of it as subscripting the Bahnhof. Any thoughts?
author: noahtheodoresimon
